response.overview: It all begins with an affair staged at a traditional Chinese funeral offerings store with the leading actress being the boss’s wife. Witnessed by an unidentified pair of eyes, the affair is followed by the sudden death of the boss caused by a bowl of soybean pudding. He is desperate to know the truth about the affair in his afterlife. Eventually he is brought back to the piece of memory that entangles among two boys and a girl, on fighting for their pride through a slingshot battle against the boss of students.
response.title: Au Revoir
